title: Examination of an unconscious patient
brief_description: This program demonstrates basic precautions to be undertaken when an accident has occurred. “Examination Of An Unconscious Patient” is an excellent basic level First Aid training resource, designed specifically for the training of non-medical personnel and conforming to Australian Resuscitation Council Standards.
